title: The Berlin Secret
imgSmText: A German nurse hides a Jewish man, finding forbidden love in WW2.
imgText: In 1943 Berlin, a nurse's act of defiance becomes a dangerous secret romance. Their love must survive the constant threat of discovery by the Nazi regime.

title: Saigon Serenade
imgSmText: An American journalist and a Vietnamese translator fall in love in 1971.
imgText: Amid the chaos of the Vietnam War, a relationship blossoms between a cynical war correspondent and his optimistic local translator, challenging both their worldviews.

title: Riyadh Skies
imgSmText: A female architect and a pilot navigate love in modern Saudi Arabia.
imgText: A pioneering female architect returning to Riyadh finds an unexpected connection with a royal airline pilot, testing the boundaries of tradition and personal freedom.

title: Desert Rose
imgSmText: A Bedouin guide and a city geologist find love in the Empty Quarter.
imgText: A geologist mapping the Rub' al Khali is saved by a nomadic guide. Their journey through the world's largest sand desert turns into a life-changing cultural and romantic exchange.

title: Minsk Whispers
imgSmText: Two musicians fall in love while secretly protesting the regime.
imgText: In modern Minsk, a classical violinist and a rebellious rock pianist form a duo. Their music becomes an act of protest, and their love a beacon of hope against oppression.

title: Copenhagen Hearts
imgSmText: Two rival chefs are forced to run a restaurant together in Denmark.
imgText: After inheriting the same Copenhagen restaurant, two rival chefs with clashing styles must learn to work together, discovering their rivalry might be a recipe for love.

title: Rio Rhythm
imgSmText: A samba dancer and a classical cellist find harmony in Brazil.
imgText: A free-spirited samba dancer and a disciplined cellist from different worlds are forced to collaborate on a major performance, finding their rhythms sync in more ways than one.

title: Salar Sunrise
imgSmText: Tourists from different countries meet on a tour of the salt flats.
imgText: A jaded American and a spirited Korean tourist keep crossing paths on a Bolivian tour. The stunning landscape of the salt flats becomes the backdrop for a transformative romance.

title: The Outback Proposal
imgSmText: City rivals become stranded together in the Australian outback.
imgText: Two corporate rivals from Sydney get lost on a work trip in the Outback. To survive, they must rely on each other, discovering a connection far deeper than business.

title: Jeddah Tides
imgSmText: A freediver and a marine biologist connect beneath the Red Sea.
imgText: A traditional freediver, in tune with the sea, meets a pragmatic marine biologist. Their shared love for the ocean bridges the gap between tradition and science.

title: The Belarusian Code
imgSmText: Love blooms between hackers on opposite sides of a cyber conflict.
imgText: A Belarussian hacker working for the opposition accidentally falls for her rival, a hacker defending the state. Their online war becomes a complicated, real-world romance.

title: Aarhus Anthem
imgSmText: A folk singer and a pop star find love in Denmark's second city.
imgText: A rootsy folk singer and a mainstream pop star are paired for a charity concert in Aarhus. They must blend their styles, and in doing so, compose a song for each other.

title: Samba & Suits
imgSmText: A carnival designer and a finance executive clash in Sao Paulo.
imgText: To save his family's company, a straight-laced executive must sponsor a flamboyant samba school, led by a fiercely passionate artist who turns his ordered world upside down.

title: La Paz Heights
imgSmText: A tour guide and a climber find love in the Bolivian Andes.
imgText: A cautious tour guide and a risk-taking mountain climber are forced to partner for a high-altitude trek, learning about trust and life's perspectives in the thin air.

title: Brisbane Rain
imgSmText: Two strangers keep meeting by chance during a rainy season in Australia.
imgText: In the subtropical rain of Brisbane, two lonely souls experience a series of seemingly random encounters, wondering if fate is pushing them together for a reason.

title: Cherry Blossoms
imgSmText: Japanese romance in spring
imgText: In Tokyo, a florist falls in love with a shy writer, their gentle romance unfolding as seasons change.

title: Midnight Ride
imgSmText: Romance on motorcycle trip through Sweden
imgText: Two strangers meet on a motorcycle road trip and discover love in unexpected places across winding roads and open skies.

title: Letters in the Rain
imgSmText: Period romance from the 18th century with sailor returning to his love
imgText: Two people fall in love through handwritten letters across continents, testing patience and devotion.

title: Summer Rewind
imgSmText: US high school romance and a summer that changes everything.
imgText: A nostalgic coming-of-age story of friends turned lovers during a summer that defines their youth.

title: Cafe of Second Chances
imgSmText: Love blooms in Paris cafe where laughter and love prevails paint and beyond.
imgText: A divorced chef and a painter meet in a small Paris cafe, slowly piecing their lives back together through laughter and love.

title: A Lady's Scandal
imgSmText: An 18th-century governess falls for the estate's mysterious lord.
imgText: A headstrong governess arrives at a remote estate and uncovers its dark secrets, finding an unexpected and forbidden connection with the brooding, reclusive master of the house.

title: Echoes of the Sun
imgSmText: A Neanderthal man and woman form a bond in a harsh ice age world.
imgText: 40,000 years ago, amidst the struggle for survival, a tender connection blossoms between two members of a clan, showcasing the first echoes of human emotion and love.

title: Mumbai Melody
imgSmText: Two aspiring musicians from rival families fall in love in modern Mumbai.
imgText: Their families are bitter rivals in the music industry, but when two talented singers meet, their harmonies create a melody that threatens to undo a generations-old feud.

title: Kashmir Secret
imgSmText: A Hindu woman and a Muslim man defy conflict for their love in Kashmir.
imgText: Set against the breathtaking yet divided landscape of Kashmir, a secret romance forces a young couple to choose between their families' expectations and their hearts.

title: Chennai Connection
imgSmText: A conservative grandmother's love letters from the 1960s are discovered.
imgText: When a modern woman discovers her grandmother's hidden letters to a man from a different caste, she uncovers a heartbreaking love story that changes her view of her family's past.

title: Sofia's Heart
imgSmText: A Bulgarian artist finds love with a chef while restoring a mural in Sofia.
imgText: A meticulous mural artist arrives in Sofia to restore a historic painting and finds her life and her heart disrupted by the charming, impulsive owner of the local restaurant.

title: Crimean Sky
imgSmText: A Ukrainian nurse and a Russian soldier find humanity during the war.
imgText: Amidst the chaos of the ongoing conflict, a chance encounter in a makeshift hospital leads to a forbidden connection that challenges everything they've been told about the enemy.

title: Olive Trees of Hope
imgSmText: Two childhood friends are separated during the 1948 Palestinian Nakba.
imgText: As their village is torn apart, a young Palestinian man and woman are separated. Their story becomes a decades-long quest to find each other again, a testament to enduring love.

title: Desert Harmony
imgSmText: A famous singer falls for another woman at a yoga retreat in Namibia.
imgText: Seeking solitude, a world-famous pop star attends a silent yoga retreat in the Namib desert and forms a deep, life-changing connection with a quiet yoga instructor.

title: The Ghana Promise
imgSmText: Two friends in Ethiopia navigate life and love from youth to old age.
imgText: Spanning 50 years, this series follows the deep bond between two friends in Addis Ababa. Through marriage, children, and loss, their connection remains the constant thread of their lives.

title: South Pole Diary
imgSmText: A documentary-style love story of two explorers wintering in Antarctica.
imgText: Based on true events, this film chronicles the intense, isolated experience of two researchers spending a winter at the South Pole, where professional respect blossoms into profound love.

title: The Prince's Star
imgSmText: A Thai prince falls for an Australian actress visiting Bangkok.
imgText: During a diplomatic visit, a structured Crown Prince has his world turned upside down by a free-spirited Australian actress, forcing him to choose between duty and desire.

title: Switched
imgSmText: Twin sisters unknowingly fall for the same mysterious new guy at school.
imgText: A case of mistaken identity leads to twin sisters both dating the same charming new student. The hilarious and heartfelt chaos forces them to confront their own identities.

title: Queen's Gambit
imgSmText: A 16-year-old chess prodigy has an affair with her charismatic older coach.
imgText: As she rises to become a national chess champion, a vulnerable teenager enters into a dangerous and manipulative relationship with the football coach who is her mentor.

title: For You, Always
imgSmText: A Belgian YouTuber makes hilarious videos to win over his crush.
imgText: A shy but witty man is too nervous to talk to his neighbor, so he expresses his feelings by creating absurdly funny YouTube videos dedicated to her, without revealing his identity.

title: The Parisian Promise
imgSmText: An American in Paris falls for a cynical bookseller in this series.
imgText: Over several seasons, a aspiring writer's life becomes intertwined with a grumpy bookstore owner. Their will-they-won't-they romance unfolds over years in the City of Light.

title: London Rain
imgSmText: A UK politician's daughter and a paparazzo find an unlikely connection.
imgText: The daughter of a powerful politician lives her life in the spotlight until she meets the paparazzo who is always chasing her. Their animosity turns into a secret, intense affair.

title: Texas Heat
imgSmText: A rodeo star and a vegan journalist clash in this romantic comedy.
imgText: A hard-headed rodeo champion is forced to work with an environmentally-conscious journalist writing an expose on his industry, leading to a hilarious and steamy culture clash.

title: The Lisbon Recipe
imgSmText: A food critic rediscovers her passion with a chef in Lisbon.
imgText: After a personal tragedy, a renowned food critic loses her sense of taste. A trip to Lisbon and a meeting with a passionate chef helps her find the flavor in life again.

title: Helsinki Sunrise
imgSmText: Two strangers share one perfect day during the midnight sun.
imgText: A American tourist and a local Finnish artist meet by chance and decide to spend one endless day together exploring Helsinki, knowing they must part when the sun finally sets.
